title: Reliability of toxicokinetic modelling for PFAS exposure assessment in contaminated water in northern Italy
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): L. Vaccari, A. Ranzi, C. Canova, G. Ghermandi, S. Giannini, G. Pitter, F. Russo, J. Stefanelli, S. Teggi, A. Vantini, M.Z. Jeddi, T. Fletcher, A. Colacci
